description: This is your personal ID card.  The reverse side describes the protocol for using it; this grants you access to the barracks locker room.
This is an ID card you found.  The reverse side describes the protocol for using it; this grants you access to the barracks locker room.
This is an ID card you found.  The reverse side describes the protocol for using it; this grants you access to the workshop's exosuit storage bay.
A slim card that is used to initialize a STEED, which will then imprint the rider's biometric data and follow them unerringly.
A master keycard for all TSKBEM prefab industrial infrastructure built before the year 2152.  Invaluable to anyone seeking to salvage the industrial ruins of Orion.

Issued only to the highest echelons of Mercurial corporate security, these cards provide unfettered access to all enforcer prefab facilites built before the year 2152.  A lucrative find for any salvor on Salus IV.

A master keycard for nearly all Mercurial corporate facilities and infrastructure built before the year 2152.  Invaluable on Salus IV, this card will grant you entry to all but the most secure Mercurial facilities.
